altername_name: Simple 1500 Series vol.052: The Wrestler World 2
name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 52: The Pro Wrestling 2
overview: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 52 - The Wrestler World 2 is the second wrestling game in the simple 1500 game series, featuring 20 different characters, different game modes and a character editor in which the player can create a new wrestler from the beginning defining the body, face, and stats. Game mode: - Exhibition Mode - Champion Road Mode - Wrestler Edit Mode The game features also a 2 players vs mode.
